name: Chiliz
intro: Blockchain Fintech Provider for Sports and Entertainment
introduce:
Chiliz is a blockchain fintech provider for sports & entertainment. Chiliz developed blockchain-based fan engagement & rewards platform Socios.com which is built on the Chiliz blockchain infrastructure and uses CHZ as it’s exclusive on-platform currency.
Fans can purchase & trade branded Fan Tokens as well as having the ability to participate, influence, and vote in club-focused surveys & polls. Chiliz aims to foster a blockchain ecosystem built for sports and entertainment.
